name: Paranoid (itch) (Clyde Team)
description:
Are You Truly Alone? Description

Waking up to the sound of the clapping thunder and ear-piecing lightning to find yourself in a foreign location. Exploring what looks like a hospital players will have to locate a variety of items in the attempt to find an exit.

however, YOU ARE NOT ALONE or..... are you.

[DISCLAIMER]

When entering the first cutscene hit escape twice to stop playing the ambient music from the home screen.

Controls

WASD - Walking

E - Interact

F - Flashlight

Credits

Developed by: Clyde Team

Game Dev: Jaywade

Artist: Jaspic
